item.title: Ascott Star Rewards is marking its second anniversary with special promotions
item.description: Ascott Star Rewards (ASR), the loyalty program of The Ascott Limited, is marking its second anniversary with a “Celebrate The Little Joys” campaign. This campaign offers double bonus points and complimentary tier upgrades to show appreciation and reward its members. Since its 2019 launch, ASR has experienced over 400% membership growth. ASR members are responsible for roughly 90% of Ascottâ€™s direct online bookings, and over 60% are repeat guests. Compared to non-members, ASR members spend 36% more with Ascott.
